room_title: Escape room "The San Andreas Earthquake Experience" by Clueology Rooms in Fort Collins
room_address: 907 N Van Buren Ave #150 Loveland, CO 80537
room_description:
In 1989, the California Loma Prieta earthquake wreaked havoc and devastation. In 2017, the long-anticipated "big one" hits, trapping you and your tour group in the newly developed antimatter clean-power generation facility. You are directly over the San Andreas fault. Did mother nature cause the quake, or was it the antimatter reactor? Silicon Valley is in chaos, emergency services are overwhelmed, nobody knows where you are... Will you be able to save yourselves and escape?
This room has an earthquake simulator and may be too realistic for young children.
